title: Hextech opening
body: My brother CaptainCalvinFTW has opened a hextech chest but got nothing out it, he tried re-login and refreshing the page but it didn't help. plz help him.

replies.body:
It's likely your brother experienced a drop in his connection during the opening and didn't see what came out of the chest. If he'd like us to run through what happened with that box specifically, have him [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Our account specialists will be able to assist him further with this.

Let me know if you have any questions.
